transcript: I don't know what to tell you babe. Maybe you're right maybe you do have to go some place else. I don't know maybe it's just not meant to be here. I mean I want you to, I don't want you to give up but I mean I don't want you to move away. But at the same time I don't like seeing you like this.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know what to tell you, babe. Maybe- Maybe you're right.  Maybe you do have to go someplace else.  I don't know, maybe it's just not meant to be here.  I mean I want you to-I don't want you to give up, but I mean I don't want you to move away, but at the same time, I don't like seeing you like this.
